text: Ollie's Bargain Outlet is an American chain of discount closeout retailers. It was founded in Mechanicsburg, Pennsylvania, in 1982. It has 525 locations in 31 states. Its selection of merchandise comprises a variety of discounted household goods, apparel, pet supplies, kitchen pantry staples, and seasonal products. Category:Retail companies of the United States Category:1982 establishments in the United States
title: Ollie's Bargain Outlet
